TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Does Unthretta not believe Ringer Ultia for joking?

jdujaudjf

Jerald does ugly jumps, and Ugly Duck jumps fire!

hofvov

Harry ordered franks, very old veal.

qhlgo

Quietly, Harvey Looked Gladstone Over

SPACE

Squad's Peculiar Aerodynamics Confuse Extraterrestrials

tkktrr

Testing Kerbal's Klaw To Real Restraint. [That made no sense at all.]

WINGSPEAR

Willy Initiated New Gold System: "Pentamax"; Electrocuted a rat.

That didn't make any sense at all. It sounds like I'm speaking French in English... 

HELIOTROPE

Harmless Earth Lost Internet Outbreak Test, Reckless Outer Planet Escaped. (They are related, trust me.)

QWERTY

Queen Whipped Entire Retards There, Yup.

SHPEE

Superhuman Particles eating everyone.

dfgnwemf

do fingers give notes with emergency mind farts?

PLPLLHZZXTT

People, listen. Please let's locate his zillion zany xenophobic tarantulas together.

yadirfsti

Yarn and dirt indicates real fun times singing icycles

Dont ask

Jsoejdhs

Jeb saw one epic jelly doughnut Harry sold

gcylasb

Gaping cyst, you loud absentminded sport! Blasphemy!

Urjec

Uranus' random jolts electrocute Cordelia

SYSC

Seriously, You Sent Credits?

URANUS

Universal Rankin-Alloy Nitrogenous Uctuation System

Oh dear! Storm troopers!
